title: When Hardhat-toolbox dependency update?
body:
### Describe the feature

```
warning " > @nomicfoundation/hardhat-toolbox@2.0.2" has unmet peer dependency "@ethersproject/abi@^5.4.7".
warning " > @nomicfoundation/hardhat-toolbox@2.0.2" has unmet peer dependency "@ethersproject/providers@^5.4.7".
warning " > @nomicfoundation/hardhat-toolbox@2.0.2" has unmet peer dependency "@nomicfoundation/hardhat-network-helpers@^1.0.0".
warning " > @nomicfoundation/hardhat-toolbox@2.0.2" has unmet peer dependency "@nomicfoundation/hardhat-chai-matchers@^1.0.0".
warning " > @nomicfoundation/hardhat-toolbox@2.0.2" has unmet peer dependency "@nomiclabs/hardhat-ethers@^2.0.0".
warning " > @nomicfoundation/hardhat-toolbox@2.0.2" has unmet peer dependency "@nomiclabs/hardhat-etherscan@^3.0.0".
warning " > @nomicfoundation/hardhat-toolbox@2.0.2" has unmet peer dependency "@types/chai@^4.2.0".
warning " > @nomicfoundation/hardhat-toolbox@2.0.2" has unmet peer dependency "@types/mocha@>=9.1.0".
warning " > @nomicfoundation/hardhat-toolbox@2.0.2" has unmet peer dependency "@typechain/ethers-v5@^10.1.0".
warning " > @nomicfoundation/hardhat-toolbox@2.0.2" has unmet peer dependency "@typechain/hardhat@^6.1.2".
warning " > @nomicfoundation/hardhat-toolbox@2.0.2" has unmet peer dependency "chai@^4.2.0".
warning " > @nomicfoundation/hardhat-toolbox@2.0.2" has incorrect peer dependency "ethers@^5.4.7".
warning " > @nomicfoundation/hardhat-toolbox@2.0.2" has unmet peer dependency "hardhat-gas-reporter@^1.0.8".
warning " > @nomicfoundation/hardhat-toolbox@2.0.2" has unmet peer dependency "solidity-coverage@^0.8.1".
warning " > @nomicfoundation/hardhat-toolbox@2.0.2" has unmet peer dependency "typechain@^8.1.0".
```


seems there are no updates for hardhat-toolbox.

### Search terms

_No response_
